00029 ChunkBase::ChunkBase ( size_t nrOfColumns, size_t nrOfRows, size_t nrOfSlices, size_t nrOfTimesteps )
00030 {
00031     const size_t idx[] = {nrOfColumns, nrOfRows, nrOfSlices, nrOfTimesteps};
00032     init( idx );
00033     addNeededFromString( neededProperties );
00034     LOG_IF( NDimensional<4>::getVolume() == 0, Debug, warning )
00035             << "Size " << nrOfTimesteps << "|" << nrOfSlices << "|" << nrOfRows << "|" << nrOfColumns << " is invalid";
00036 }
00037 
00038 ChunkBase::~ChunkBase() { }
00039 
00040 }
00042 
00043 Chunk::Chunk( const ValueArrayReference &src, size_t nrOfColumns, size_t nrOfRows, size_t nrOfSlices, size_t nrOfTimesteps, bool fakeValid ):
00044     _internal::ChunkBase( nrOfColumns, nrOfRows, nrOfSlices, nrOfTimesteps ),
00045     ValueArrayReference( src )
00046 {
00047     assert( ( *this )->getLength() == getVolume() );
00048 
00049     if( fakeValid ) {
00050         setPropertyAs( "indexOrigin", util::fvector4() );
00051         setPropertyAs( "acquisitionNumber", 0 );
00052         setPropertyAs( "voxelSize", util::fvector4( 1, 1, 1 ) );
00053         setPropertyAs( "rowVec", util::fvector4( 1, 0 ) );
00054         setPropertyAs( "columnVec", util::fvector4( 0, 1 ) );
00055     }
00056 }

00058 Chunk Chunk::cloneToNew( size_t nrOfColumns, size_t nrOfRows, size_t nrOfSlices, size_t nrOfTimesteps )const
00059 {
00060     return createByID( getTypeID(), nrOfColumns, nrOfRows, nrOfSlices, nrOfTimesteps );
00061 }
00062 
00063 Chunk Chunk::createByID ( unsigned short ID, size_t nrOfColumns, size_t nrOfRows, size_t nrOfSlices, size_t nrOfTimesteps, bool fakeValid )
00064 {
00065     util::vector4<size_t> newSize( nrOfColumns, nrOfRows, nrOfSlices, nrOfTimesteps );
00066     assert( newSize.product() );
00067     const ValueArrayReference created( ValueArrayBase::createByID( ID, newSize.product() ) );
00068     return  Chunk( created, newSize[0], newSize[1], newSize[2], newSize[3], fakeValid );
00069 }
00070 
00071 bool Chunk::convertToType( short unsigned int ID, scaling_pair scaling )
00072 {
00073     //get a converted ValueArray (will be a cheap copy if no conv was needed)
00074     ValueArrayReference newPtr = asValueArrayBase().convertByID( ID, scaling );
00075 
00076     if( newPtr.isEmpty() ) // if the reference is empty the conversion failed
00077         return false;
00078     else
00079         static_cast<ValueArrayReference &>( *this ) = newPtr; // otherwise replace my own ValueArray with the new one
00080 
00081     return true;
00082 }

00097 void Chunk::copySlice( size_t thirdDimS, size_t fourthDimS, Chunk &dst, size_t thirdDimD, size_t fourthDimD ) const
00098 {
00099     const size_t idx1[] = {0, 0, thirdDimS, fourthDimS};
00100     const size_t idx2[] = {getSizeAsVector()[0] - 1, getSizeAsVector()[1] - 1, thirdDimS, fourthDimS};
00101     const size_t idx3[] = {0, 0, thirdDimD, fourthDimD};
00102     copyRange( idx1, idx2, dst, idx3 );
00103 }
00104 
00105 void Chunk::copyRange( const size_t source_start[], const size_t source_end[], Chunk &dst, const size_t destination[] ) const
00106 {
00107     LOG_IF( ! isInRange( source_start ), Debug, error )
00108             << "Copy start " << util::vector4<size_t>( source_start )
00109             << " is out of range (" << getSizeAsString() << ") at the source chunk";
00110     LOG_IF( ! isInRange( source_end ), Debug, error )
00111             << "Copy end " << util::vector4<size_t>( source_end )
00112             << " is out of range (" << getSizeAsString() << ") at the source chunk";
00113     LOG_IF( ! dst.isInRange( destination ), Debug, error )
00114             << "Index " << util::vector4<size_t>( destination )
00115             << " is out of range (" << getSizeAsString() << ") at the destination chunk";
00116     const size_t sstart = getLinearIndex( source_start );
00117     const size_t send = getLinearIndex( source_end );
00118     const size_t dstart = dst.getLinearIndex( destination );
00119     getValueArrayBase().copyRange( sstart, send, *dst, dstart );
00120 }
00121 
00122 size_t Chunk::compareRange( const size_t source_start[], const size_t source_end[], const Chunk &dst, const size_t destination[] ) const
00123 {
00124     LOG_IF( ! isInRange( source_start ), Debug, error )
00125             << "memcmp start " << util::vector4<size_t>( source_start )
00126             << " is out of range (" << getSizeAsString() << ") at the first chunk";
00127     LOG_IF( ! isInRange( source_end ), Debug, error )
00128             << "memcmp end " << util::vector4<size_t>( source_end )
00129             << " is out of range (" << getSizeAsString() << ") at the first chunk";
00130     LOG_IF( ! dst.isInRange( destination ), Debug, error )
00131             << "Index " << util::vector4<size_t>( destination )
00132             << " is out of range (" << getSizeAsString() << ") at the second chunk";
00133     LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00134             << "Comparing range from " << util::vector4<size_t>( source_start ) << " to " << util::vector4<size_t>( source_end )
00135             << " and " << util::vector4<size_t>( destination );
00136     const size_t sstart = getLinearIndex( source_start );
00137     const size_t send = getLinearIndex( source_end );
00138     const size_t dstart = dst.getLinearIndex( destination );
00139     return getValueArrayBase().compare( sstart, send, dst.getValueArrayBase(), dstart );
00140 }
00141 size_t Chunk::compare( const isis::data::Chunk &dst ) const
00142 {
00143     if( getSizeAsVector() == dst.getSizeAsVector() )
00144         return getValueArrayBase().compare( 0, getVolume() - 1, dst.getValueArrayBase(), 0 );
00145     else
00146         return std::max( getVolume(), dst.getVolume() );
00147 }

00164 Chunk &Chunk::operator=( const Chunk &ref )
00165 {
00166     _internal::ChunkBase::operator=( static_cast<const _internal::ChunkBase &>( ref ) ); //copy the metadate of ref
00167     ValueArrayReference::operator=( static_cast<const ValueArrayReference &>( ref ) ); // copy the reference of ref's data
00168     return *this;
00169 }
00170 
00171 std::list<Chunk> Chunk::autoSplice ( uint32_t acquisitionNumberStride )const
00172 {
00173     if ( !isValid() ) {
00174         LOG( Runtime, error ) << "Cannot splice invalid Chunk (missing properties are " << this->getMissing() << ")";
00175         return std::list<Chunk>();
00176     }
00177 
00178     util::fvector4 offset;
00179     const util::fvector4 voxelSize = propertyValue( "voxelSize" ).castTo<util::fvector4>();
00180     util::fvector4 voxelGap;
00181 
00182     if( hasProperty( "voxelGap" ) )
00183         voxelGap = propertyValue( "voxelGap" ).castTo<util::fvector4>();
00184 
00185     const util::fvector4 distance = voxelSize + voxelGap;
00186     size_t atDim = getRelevantDims() - 1;
00187 
00188     switch( atDim ) { // init offset with the given direction
00189     case rowDim :
00190         offset = this->propertyValue( "rowVec" ).castTo<util::fvector4>();
00191         break;
00192     case columnDim:
00193         offset = this->propertyValue( "columnVec" ).castTo<util::fvector4>();
00194         break;
00195     case sliceDim:
00196 
00197         if( this->hasProperty( "sliceVec" ) ) {
00198             offset = this->propertyValue( "sliceVec" ).castTo<util::fvector4>();
00199         } else {
00200             const util::fvector4 row = this->propertyValue( "rowVec" ).castTo<util::fvector4>();
00201             const util::fvector4 column = this->propertyValue( "columnVec" ).castTo<util::fvector4>();
00202             assert( util::fuzzyEqual<float>( row.sqlen(), 1 ) );
00203             assert( util::fuzzyEqual<float>( column.sqlen(), 1 ) );
00204             offset[0] = row[1] * column[2] - row[2] * column[1];
00205             offset[1] = row[2] * column[0] - row[0] * column[2];
00206             offset[2] = row[0] * column[1] - row[1] * column[0];
00207         }
00208 
00209         break;
00210     case timeDim :
00211         offset = util::fvector4( 0, 0, 0, 1 );
00212     }
00213 
00214     // prepare some attributes
00215     assert( util::fuzzyEqual<float>( offset.sqlen(), 1 ) ); // it should be norm here
00216     const util::fvector4 indexOriginOffset = offset * distance[atDim];
00217 
00218     LOG( Debug, info ) << "Splicing chunk at dimenstion " << atDim + 1 << " with indexOrigin stride " << indexOriginOffset << " and acquisitionNumberStride " << acquisitionNumberStride;
00219     std::list<Chunk> ret = splice( ( dimensions )atDim ); // do low level splice - get the chunklist
00220 
00221     std::list<Chunk>::iterator it = ret.begin();
00222     it++;// skip the first one
00223 
00224     for( size_t cnt = 1; it != ret.end(); it++, cnt++ ) { // adapt some metadata in them
00225         util::fvector4 &orig = it->propertyValue( "indexOrigin" ).castTo<util::fvector4>();
00226 
00227         if( orig == ret.front().getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "indexOrigin" ) ) { // fix pos if its the same as for the first
00228             LOG( Debug, verbose_info ) << "Origin was " << orig << " will be moved by " << indexOriginOffset << "*"  << cnt;
00229             orig = orig + indexOriginOffset * ( float )cnt;
00230         }
00231 
00232         uint32_t &acq = it->propertyValue( "acquisitionNumber" ).castTo<uint32_t>();
00233 
00234         if( acq == ret.front().getPropertyAs<uint32_t>( "acquisitionNumber" ) ) {
00235             LOG( Debug, verbose_info ) << "acquisitionNumber was " << acq << " will be moved by " << acquisitionNumberStride << "*"  << cnt;
00236             acq += acquisitionNumberStride * cnt; //@todo this might cause trouble if we try to insert this chunks into an image
00237         }
00238     }
00239 
00240     return ret;
00241 }
00242 
00243 std::list<Chunk> Chunk::splice ( dimensions atDim )const
00244 {
00245     std::list<Chunk> ret;
00246 
00247     //@todo should be locking
00248     typedef std::vector<ValueArrayReference> ValueArrayList;
00249     const util::FixedVector<size_t, dims> wholesize = getSizeAsVector();
00250     util::FixedVector<size_t, dims> spliceSize;
00251     spliceSize.fill( 1 ); //init size of one chunk-splice to 1x1x1x1
00252     //copy the relevant dimensional sizes from wholesize (in case of sliceDim we copy only the first two elements of wholesize - making slices)
00253     spliceSize.copyFrom( &wholesize[0], &wholesize[atDim] );
00254     //get the spliced ValueArray's (the volume of the requested dims is the split-size - in case of sliceDim it is rows*columns)
00255     const ValueArrayList pointers = this->getValueArrayBase().splice( spliceSize.product() );
00256 
00257     const util::PropertyMap::KeyList lists = this->findLists();
00258     size_t list_idx = 0;
00259 
00260     //create new Chunks from this ValueArray's
00261     BOOST_FOREACH( ValueArrayList::const_reference ref, pointers ) {
00262         ret.push_back( Chunk( ref, spliceSize[0], spliceSize[1], spliceSize[2], spliceSize[3] ) ); //@todo make sure this is only one copy-operation
00263         static_cast<util::PropertyMap &>( ret.back() ) = static_cast<const util::PropertyMap &>( *this ); // copy all props into the splices
00264         BOOST_FOREACH( const util::PropertyMap::KeyType & key, lists ) { // override list-entries in the splices with their respective entries
00265             ret.back().propertyValue( key ) = this->propertyValueAt( key, list_idx );
00266         }
00267         //      std::cout << static_cast<util::PropertyMap &>( ret.back() ) << std::endl;
00268         list_idx++;
00269     }
00270     return ret;
00271 }

00273 size_t Chunk::useCount() const

00278 void Chunk::swapAlong( const dimensions dim ) const
00279 {
00280     const size_t elSize = getBytesPerVoxel();
00281     const util::vector4<size_t> whole_size = getSizeAsVector();
00282 
00283     boost::shared_ptr<uint8_t> swap_ptr = boost::shared_static_cast<uint8_t>( get()->getRawAddress() );
00284     uint8_t *swap_start = swap_ptr.get();
00285     const uint8_t *const swap_end = swap_start + whole_size.product() * elSize;
00286 
00287     size_t block_volume = whole_size.product();
00288 
00289     for( int i = data::timeDim; i >= dim; i-- ) {
00290         assert( ( block_volume % whole_size[i] ) == 0 );
00291         block_volume /= whole_size[i];
00292     }
00293 
00294     assert( block_volume );
00295     block_volume *= elSize;
00296     const size_t swap_volume = block_volume * whole_size[dim];
00297     const boost::scoped_array<uint8_t> buff( new uint8_t[ block_volume ] );
00298 
00299     //iterate over all swap-volumes
00300     for( ; swap_start < swap_end; swap_start += swap_volume ) { //outer loop
00301         // swap each block with the one at the oppsite end of the swap_volume
00302         uint8_t *a = swap_start; //first block
00303         uint8_t *b = swap_start + swap_volume - block_volume; //last block within the swap-volume
00304 
00305         for( ; a < b; a += block_volume, b -= block_volume ) { // grow a, shrink b (inner loop)
00306             memcpy( buff.get(), a, block_volume );
00307             memcpy( a, b, block_volume );
00308             memcpy( b, buff.get(), block_volume );
00309         }
00310 
00311     }
00312 }
00313 
00314 util::PropertyValue &Chunk::propertyValueAt( const util::PropertyMap::KeyType &key, size_t at )
00315 {
00316     std::vector< util::PropertyValue > &vec = propertyValueVec( key );
00317     const size_t cSize = getSizeAsVector()[getRelevantDims() - 1];
00318 
00319     if( vec.size() != cSize ) {
00320         LOG( Debug, info ) << "Resizing sub-property " << key << " to size of the chunk (" << cSize  << ")";
00321         vec.resize( cSize );
00322     }
00323 
00324     return vec.at( at );
00325 }
00326 const util::PropertyValue &Chunk::propertyValueAt( const util::PropertyMap::KeyType &key, size_t at ) const
00327 {
00328     const std::vector< util::PropertyValue > &vec = propertyValueVec( key );
00329     const size_t cSize = getSizeAsVector()[getRelevantDims() - 1];
00330     LOG_IF( vec.size() != cSize, Debug, warning ) << "Sub-property " << key << " does not have the size of the chunk (" << cSize  << ")";
00331     return vec.at( at );
00332 }

00353 const util::ValueReference Chunk::getVoxelValue ( size_t nrOfColumns, size_t nrOfRows, size_t nrOfSlices, size_t nrOfTimesteps ) const
00354 {
00355     const size_t idx[] = {nrOfColumns, nrOfRows, nrOfSlices, nrOfTimesteps};
00356 
00357     if ( !isInRange( idx ) ) {
00358         LOG( Debug, isis::error )
00359                 << "Index " << util::vector4<size_t>( idx ) << nrOfTimesteps
00360                 << " is out of range (" << getSizeAsString() << ")";
00361     }
00362 
00363     return begin()[getLinearIndex( idx )];
00364 }
00365 void Chunk::setVoxelValue ( const util::ValueReference &val, size_t nrOfColumns, size_t nrOfRows, size_t nrOfSlices, size_t nrOfTimesteps )
00366 {
00367     const size_t idx[] = {nrOfColumns, nrOfRows, nrOfSlices, nrOfTimesteps};
00368 
00369     if ( !isInRange( idx ) ) {
00370         LOG( Debug, isis::error )
00371                 << "Index " << util::vector4<size_t>( idx ) << nrOfTimesteps
00372                 << " is out of range (" << getSizeAsString() << ")";
00373     }
00374 
00375     begin()[getLinearIndex( idx )] = val;
00376 }
